original_title: Warwick Davis: The Seven Dwarfs of Auschwitz
overview: The actor, Warwick Davis, presents the story of the Owicz family and their ordeal during WWII. From a successful musical act to being tortuously experimented on by Dr. Josef Mengele in a concentration camp. This story might have been lost to history if it weren't for the family's diminutive size, which made them both a novelty as well as an inspiration.
title: Warwick Davis: The Seven Dwarfs of Auschwitz
